## Experiment

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(Seurat)
library(BPCells)

options(future.globals.maxSize = 1e9)

obj <- readRDS("vignette_data/1p3_million_mouse_brain.rds")

penguins |> 
  select(bill_len:body_mass) |>
  remove_missing() |>
  NormalizeData() |> 
  FindVariableFeatures() |> 
  ScaleData() |> 
  RunPCA() |> 
  FindNeighbors(dims = 1:30) |> 
  FindClusters() |> 
  RunUMAP(dims = 1:30)
```
